widgetLinkOptionsPanel.title: Widget Link options
widgetLinkOptionsPanel.subTitle: Select which features you want to link between the widgets:
widgetLinkOptionsPanel.contentHelp: The content describes any content loaded in the 3D widget (Products, PointClouds...)
widgetLinkOptionsPanel.viewPointHelp: Viewpoint is the point of view obtained by zooming, translating or rotating in 3D
